HOME.BANNER_TITLE: Run Your Business From The Palm Of Your Hands!
HOME.BANNER_DESCRIPTION: AIaaS Platform For Next-Gen Automated Users Interaction
HOME.SERVICES_DESCRIPTION: How’s EveryThink AIaaS different? Non-techy users can leverage our easy-to-use low-code platform to get tangible results.  You can set up custom-branded white-label apps for android, iOS and web, with superb ease on our software as a service platform. Users can generate smart real-time connections to processes, devices, and people in a few steps! Here are our building blocks;
HOME.NETWORK_DESCRIPTION: Find all users’ input in real-time on across Android, iOS, and web Apps.
HOME.RPA_DESCRIPTION: Automate tasks, generate accurate matches, extract search results, and connect IAs with different APIs.
HOME.IOT_DESCRIPTION: Connect your devices and ensure seamless user interaction across devices in real-time.
HOME.HASSLE_FREE_SERVICE: Check out our latest blog posts!

PRICING.TITLE: Plans & Pricing
PRICING.SUB_TITLE: Leverage the power of AI without breaking the bank. We offer tailored packages for specific needs and businesses!
PRICING.LEAD_TEXT: Navigate EveryThink’s low-code platform with ease. Get started with smart Intelligent Assistants to help users perform different functions for employees, clients, prospects, investors, partners, and other stakeholders.
PRICING.BASIC_DESCRIPTION: Hit the ground running with IAs. Best way for most people!
PRICING.PROFESSIONAL_DESCRIPTION: Propel growth with AI. Great for businesses working with multiple clients.
PRICING.BUSINESS_DESCRIPTION: Maximum AI benefits and security. Small businesses, huge opportunities!
PRICING.FREE_DISCOUNT_DESCRIPTION: Discount coupon EveryThink Marketplace per month
PRICING.FREE_DATA_FLOW_DESCRIPTION: Two free data flows from EveryThink Marketplace
PRICING.CUSTOM_DATA_FLOW_DESCRIPTION: Customized data flows executed per month

ABOUT_US.TITLE: About Us
ABOUT_US.SECTION_TITLE: We provide custom Intelligent Assistants (IAs), to help you quickly define and implement real-time solutions on your own, without coding. EveryThink’s low-code platform guarantees;
ABOUT_US.GROWTH_DESCRIPTION: Propel business growth with AI technologies. Our cognitive engine boasts a tremendous learning capacity and is capable of suggesting and implementing better ways to solve everyday problems in real-time
ABOUT_US.AFFORDABILITY_DESCRIPTION: Leverage EveryThink’s software as a service to reduce human intervention and improve workflow efficiency with powerful and affordable IAs-driven solutions.
ABOUT_US.QUICK_DEPLOYMENT_DESCRIPTION: Our low-code AIaaS platform can help companies democratize data science and get their own white-label apps under 24 hours. Create, sell, buy, and deploy processes in real-time.
ABOUT_US.OUR_GOAL_DESCRIPTION: Deliver a solution that allows anyone to access their Intelligent Assistants (IAs) who will respond in real time to their needs, thus improving the quality of life of people and encouraging them to use their skills in an assertive way giving priority to innovation and human growth.
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION_1: We have revolutionized the way people can use artificial intelligence to solve their everyday problems and tasks in real-time.
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION_2: Since 2016, we've been working hard to provide a code-free platform where anyone can create geolocated Intelligent Assistants (IAs) that will dramatically simplify and increase human engagement.
ABOUT_US.DESCRIPTION_3: EveryThink enables users to develop solutions in less than 24 hours and connect all members of their network to solutions in real time through people, automated processes, and devices.
ABOUT_US.GET_STARTED_TEXT_1: Get Started on your AI journey!
ABOUT_US.GET_STARTED_TEXT_2: Talk to an EveryThink expert and see how you can get started.

TEAM.TITLE: Meet The Amazing Team Behind EveryThink
TEAM.HOME_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: At EveryThink, we believe that communities are the best agents of change. That's why we are proud to be part of a community that will revolutionize the way people, companies, and brands use AI to automate tasks and improve their businesses. Since 2016, we have been actively working to connect all actors in the supply chain with processes, people and devices to solve more problems and do more, in real time. We rely on the ingenuity of our founding team and the entire community to create more innovative solutions powered by artificial intelligence for everyday challenges.
TEAM.ABOUT_PAGE_DESCRIPTION: We are working very hard to create a more just world through technology, connecting the needs of each person with solutions in real time through people, automated processes and devices. Thus providing the ability to obtain and analyze data to constantly improve its performance.

CONTACT.TITLE: Stay Contact Us
CONTACT.DESCRIPTION: Get in touch and let us know how we can help. Fill out the form and we’ll be in touch as soon as possible.
